short_description: Basic R development environment with RStudio Web GUI
endpoints: { "name": "Shiny", "nginx": { "port": "3838", "additional": "CP_EDGE_NO_PATH_CROP CP_EDGE_EXTERNAL_APP proxy_redirect / ${CP_DOLLAR}route_location_root;proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For ${CP_DOLLAR}proxy_add_x_forwarded_for;proxy_set_header X-Real-IP ${CP_DOLLAR}remote_addr;proxy_set_header Host ${CP_DOLLAR}http_host;proxy_http_version 1.1;proxy_buffering off;proxy_set_header Upgrade ${CP_DOLLAR}http_upgrade;proxy_set_header Connection \"upgrade\";proxy_read_timeout 86400;proxy_set_header Accept-Encoding \"\";sub_filter_once on;sub_filter '</head>' '<script type=\"text/javascript\" language=\"javascript\"  src=\"https://${CP_APPLICATION_LAUNCHER_EXTERNAL_HOST}/ext-js/shiny-session.js\"></script></head>'; sub_filter '<body' '<body onload=\"startControl()\"';" }, "isDefault": false }
